\Aura\Input

\Aura\InputForm

A top-level form object to contain fields, fieldsets, collections, and anti-CSRF protection.

Methods

setAntiCsrf()

setAntiCsrf(\Aura\Input\AntiCsrfInterface $anti_csrf) : void

Sets the anti-CSRF implementation; calls the `setField()` method on the implementation to set the anti-CSRF field.

Parameters

\Aura\Input\AntiCsrfInterface $anti_csrf

The anti-CSRF implementation.
